alert.note: Alert for Eastern Rutland; Orange; Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 07 at 3:42AM EST until February 08 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Orange, Windsor and Eastern Rutland Counties. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 1 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Slippery road conditions are possible, which could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will begin as snow around the beginning of the evening commute, and change to freezing drizzle from 8 to 10 PM before ending after midnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
